code: import React,{useContext,useEffect}from'react';import{useNavigate,Link}from'react-router-dom';import AuthContext from'../../context/AuthContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Landing=()=>{const authContext=useContext(AuthContext);const{isAuthenticated}=authContext;const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{if(isAuthenticated){navigate('/dashboard');}},[isAuthenticated,navigate]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"landing",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"dark-overlay",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"landing-inner",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"x-large",children:"MERN Authentication"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"lead",children:"A complete MERN stack authentication system with user registration, login, and protected routes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"buttons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/register",className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Sign Up"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",className:"btn btn-light",children:"Login"})]})]})})});};export default Landing;
